bicycle: A bicycle thats,s itself on a path, making its own way without any external force.
bicycle with built-in GPS: A bicycle with a GPS system integrated into its frame, allowing riders to track their routes and distances covered.
bicycle with a solar-powered battery: A bicycle with a battery that is powered by a solar panel mounted on the frame, allowing riders to ride for longer distances without needing to recharge.
bicycle with a built-in sound system: A bicycle with a sound system integrated into its frame, allowing riders to listen to music or other audio while they ride.
bicycle with a built-in water filtration system: A bicycle with a water filtration system integrated into its frame, allowing riders to drink water from any source they come across while they ride.
